form_title.ms_form_title_llm_v1: Application for Certificate of Citizenship, Form N-600 ( (Rev. 9/1-83)

full_text: Form approved. FEE STAMP Budget Bureau No. 43-R0105. UNITED STATES DEPARTMENT OF JUSTICE IMMIGRATION AND NATURALIZATION SERVICE IMMIGRATION & NATURALIZATION APPLICATION FOR CERTIFICATE SERVICE OF CITIZENSHIP Take or mail this application to: MAN 23 9 41 AM 73 IMMIGRATION AND NATURALIZATION SERVICE 51 S. W. 1st AVE (ROOM 1402) Date March 19, 1973 (Print type) MIAMI, FLORIDA 33130 JOSEPH YOUNG nee 41AMI DISTRICT OFFICE (Name) (Maiden name, if any) 1759 PLANTERS ROAD (Apartment number, Street address, and, if appropriate, "in care of") ALIEN REGISTRATION JACKSONVILLE, DUVAL FLORIDA 32207 (City) (County) (State) (ZIP Code) No. A20181518 AREA CODE 904 396-0326 (Telephone Number) See Instructions on Pages 5 and 6 I hereby apply to the Commissioner of Immigration and Naturalization for a certificate showing that I am citizen of the United States of America. (1) I was born in UNKNOWN UKRAINE , RUSSIA on JULY 4. 1901 (City) (State or country) (Month) (Day) (Year) (2) My personal description is: Sex MALE ; complexion WHITE ; color of eyes BLUE ; color of hair BLACK ; height 5 feet 9 inches; weight 165 pounds; visible distinctive marks NONE Marital status: Single; Married; Divorced; Widow (er). (3) I arrived in the United States at ABOUT XXX%X 1905 CINCINNATI, OHIO UNKNOWN one (City and State) (Month) (Day) (Year) under the name JOSEPH YOSEVITZ by means of SHIP - NAME UNKNOWN (Name of ship or other means of arrival) on U.S. Passport No. unknown issued to me at on ; (Month) (Day) (Year) on an Immigrant Visa. (4) FILL IN THIS BLOCK ONLY IF YOU ARRIVED IN THE UNITED STATES BEFORE JULY 1, 1924. (a) My last permanent foreign residence was unknown RUSSIA (City) (Country) (b) I took the ship or other conveyance to the United States at Bremen, Germany (City) (Country) (c) I was ddmin FATHER ISADORE at CINC-INNATI OHIO (Name of person in the United States) (City and State where this person was living) (d) I traveled to the United States with MY MOTHER -ESTHER RIVA (Names of passengers or relatives with whom you traveled, and their relationship to you, if any) (5) Have you been out of the United States since you first arrived? Yes No. If "Yes" fill in the following information for every absence. NAME OF SHIP, OR OF AIRLINE, RAILROAD COMPANY, BUS PLACE OR PORT OF ENTRY THROUGH WHICH You DATE DEPARTED DATE RETURNED COMPANY, OR OTHER MEANS USED To RETURN TO THE RETURNED TO THE UNITED STATES UNITED STATES (Not applicable) (6) I have not filed a declaration of intention to become a citizen of the United States or a petition for naturalization. (have) (have not) (If "have" give full details on a separate sheet of paper this size and attach it, showing question number.) TO THE APPLICANT.-Do not write between the double lines below. Continue on next page. ARRIVAL RECORDS EXAMINED ARRIVAL RECORD FOUND Card index Place Date Index books NO S OR BRR Name Manifests FROM CINCINNATI OHIO FOR 1905 Manner Marital status Age Z Kornalsky (Signature of person making search) 8-15-73 UNA exthat FILE CLURK Form N-600 (Rev. 9-1-69) N.Y.C. VERIFICATION
